distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for glibc fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2015-8985: Fixed assertion failure in pop_fail_stack when executing
  a malformed regexp (bsc#1193625)

- x86: fix stack alignment in pthread_cond_[timed]wait (bsc#1196852)
- Recognize ppc64p7 arch to build for power7
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: The pop_fail_stack function in the GNU C Library (aka glibc or libc6) allows context-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service (assertion failure and application crash) via vectors related to extended regular expression processing.
notes.title: CVE description
